about_the_game:
Get ready for another epic journey with Angelo and Deemon in the highly anticipated sequel! Dive back into the classic point-and-click adventure world, where humor meets philosophy and nothing is as it seems.



When we last left Angelo, his quest for likes and views led him to Hell, with the Grim Reaper as his unexpected guide. Now, the adventure continues, taking him through Heaven, where he might meet the Big Guy himself—God.

Story

When an unforeseen celestial event offers Angelo a chance to explore Heaven, Angelo, along with his trusty sidekick Deemon, can't resist. Heaven, however, isn’t just a place of peace and tranquility. Angelo finds himself amidst divine dilemmas and celestial conundrums that only he can resolve.

What you can expect:

  • Heavenly Characters: Meet expressive and intriguingly familiar faces—some divine, some quirky, all unforgettable.
  • Stunning Visuals: Experience a visually striking game with beautifully designed levels—again, no pixel art!
  • Challenging Puzzles: Engage in addictive, brain-tickling puzzles that will make you think deeply and laugh heartily.
  • Witty Dialogue: Enjoy a seamless blend of humor and philosophy delivered through sharp, snappy dialogue.
  • Memorable Lines: Each character’s unique issues and memorable lines will stick with you, long after you’ve finished the game.
  • A Unique Adventure: Visit the serene heights of Heaven, expect a journey like no other.
  • WARNING!!! There is a chance you’ll find Heaven as amusing and intriguing as Hell, and you might not want to leave!

Join Angelo and Deemon on a celestial escapade that promises to be "Too Hell of a Quest"—a divine comedy adventure you won't want to miss!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Angelo and Deemon are back in this point-and-click adventure! Angelo’s quest for viral fame leads him to Heaven, where divine mysteries and celestial puzzles await. Join him and Deemon as they meet heavenly beings and tackle divine dilemmas.
